sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faPlay, faAngleLeft, faAngleRight, faPause, faHeart, faRepeat} from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" const PlayControl = () => { return (
skipTrackHandler("skip-back")} className='skip-back contr-btn' size='2x' icon={faAngleLeft} /> skipTrackHandler("skip-forward")} className='skip-forward contr-btn' size='2x' icon={faAngleRight} /> setIsLiked(!isLiked)} className={`heart ${isLiked && "heart-anim" } `}/>
) } export default PlayControl
